document.discussion_title: Zika concerns on first day of school
document.topic_text: Home » News » Zika concerns on first day of school Zika concerns on first day of school Submitted: 08/22/2016 - 1:51am Monday is the first day of school across Miami, where there are growing concerns about the Zika virus. Health officials are monitoring two so-called Zika zones in southern Florida. So far 36 people in the area have been infected. David Begnaud has a report. Share:
